actions.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Garrett.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to designate any nonbank financial company as "too big to fail" or as a "systemically important financial institution" or to make a determination that material financial distress at a nonbank financial company could pose a threat to U.S. financial stability.
purpose: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to designate any nonbank financial company as "too big to fail" or as a "systemically important financial institution" or to make a determination that material financial distress at a nonbank financial company could pose a threat to U.S. financial stability.
